definitions.definition: A likelihood of behaving in a particular way or going in a particular direction; a tending toward.
examples: Denim has a tendency to fade.
I have a tendency to get bored after the first half an hour of a movie.
There's a common tendency among first-game visitors to a casino to bet overcautiously.

definitions.definition: An organised unit or faction within a larger political organisation.

main_definition: A likelihood of behaving in a particular way or going in a particular direction; a tending toward.
secondary_definitions: ( politics ) An organised unit or faction within a larger political organisation.
